description: This file declares a utility function getRFCConfig within the Utils namespace. The function retrieves RFC parameter configurations via an external API call and handles success or default value statuses.

methods.name: bool getRFCConfig(const char * paramName,RFC_ParamData_t & paramOutput)
methods.description: Retrieves an RFC configuration parameter by name and populates the provided output structure.

ctags.name: getRFCConfig
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool getRFCConfig(const char* paramName, RFC_ParamData_t& paramOutput)$/
